derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin phraseologia, from Greek phraseōn, genitive plural of phrasis 'a phrase' + -logia (see -logy)

entry.def: If something is expressed using a particular type of phraseology, it is expressed in words and expressions of that type.

example.ex: This careful phraseology is clearly intended to appeal to various sides of the conflict.
example.tran: 这种谨慎的措词显然是有意迎合冲突各方。

means.word_mean: 1. the manner in which something is expressed in words;
